content:
Hey! I'm interested in contributing to the webgpu wasi interface. A little warning though, I'm very new to wasm and wasi. I'm just barely starting to grasp how the component model works. I have tried out webgpu, but I'd be lying if I said I understood it all. I'm mostly here for guidance. Also to learn more about the development of said wasi interface.

GitHub - WebAssembly/wasi-webgpu
Contribute to WebAssembly/wasi-webgpu development by creating an account on GitHub.
first step is to chat with @Mendy Berger I think....

Hi @Binus :wave:

Thanks for the interest! We're definitely looking for contributions. Please DM me, let's see how we can get you started.
